excerpt: Three stories collide in Hong Kong’s underworld: two cops pursuing a drug kingpin, an assassin closing in on the same target, and a trio of desperate ex-cons planning one last heist.
title: Men from the Gutter

excerpt: In 1950, a motley crew of inept Boston thieves pull off the then-biggest heist in history by robbing the Brink’s warehouse.
title: The Brink's Job

excerpt: In a deserted luxury hotel on the Belgian coast, a Hungarian Countess corrupts a newlywed couple.
title: Daughters of Darkness

excerpt: A mysterious woman lures a trio of British adventurers to her lost kingdom in Africa, believing one of them to be the reincarnation of her long-dead lover.
title: She

excerpt: When a neighborhood kid is fingered for murder, aging alcoholic defense attorney Spencer Tracy comes out of semi-retirement to take the case, only to backslide under the pressure.
title: The People Against O'Hara
